name: Always On by DirectTV
author: DirectTV
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src https://localhost:3000 wss://localhost:3000 http://skeletor.cloudster.tv; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src https://dtvimages.hs.llnwd.net 'self' data:;
